author: fitz
msg: Locking branch: Fix stupid crasher bug (committed by me) when attempting to
lock files that are in subdirectories.
(open_lock_targets): Index into the same array that you're iterating

author: sussman
msg: Make 'svn info' take a -r argument.  A one-line change, if you can believe it.

author: sussman
msg: Locking branch:  make 'svn info' display both local and remote locks.
(print_info):  display the info->svn_lock_t information if available.
(build_info_from_entry):  extract svn_wc_entry_t lock data into svn_info_t.
(build_info_from_dirent):  take a lock argument, store it in svn_info_t.
(push_dir_info):  take a hash of locks, and use them.
and stuff fetched svn_lock_t's into appropriate svn_info_t's.

author: fitz
msg: * COMMITTERS: Add a few spaces to Ph. Marek's entry
